channel.title: Some error with Richscape base
channel.description:
well im trying to make more than one name for a command and i get this after compiling, anyone know the alternative || for richscape ???? :confused:
[code]client.java:1872: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String[/code] [code]client.java:1872: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Namless") || ("N") || ("Kevin")) { ^ client.java:5074: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (command.equals("xteleall") && (playerName.equals("Kevin") || ("Nameless"))) { ^ client.java:5159: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall") && (playerName.equals("Kevin") | | ("Nameless") || ("N"))) {[/code] ^

item.title: Some error with Richscape base
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Namless") || ("N") || ("Kevin")

should be

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Namless") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("N") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase ("Kevin")

Read full topic

item.title: Some error with Richscape base
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

well im trying to make more than one name for a command and i get this after compiling, anyone know the alternative || for richscape ??? 

client.java:1872: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String

client.java:1872: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Namless") || ("N") || ("Kevin")) { ^ client.java:5074: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (command.equals("xteleall") && (playerName.equals("Kevin") || ("Nameless"))) { ^ client.java:5159: operator || cannot be applied to boolean,java.lang.String if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall") && (playerName.equals("Kevin") | | ("Nameless") || ("N"))) {
^
